ThingDef.label: potion of healing
ThingDef.description: A one-use magic potion. The magic in the potion will heal the single worst health condition affecting someone at any given time. Works even on health conditions that would otherwise be incurable. The magic can even build new organic matter, forming new limbs or organs as needed.

ThingDef.label: love potion
ThingDef.description:
A potion that can be drank by a pawn. Upon doing so, that pawn must indicate a second pawn in the area. The second pawn must be an appropriate pawn; it must be humanlike, and with the proper sexual orientation and gender.

Can only be used by and on pawns that do not currently have relationship partners. Must also be used on partners of the appropriate gender for the user and target's sexual orientations. Not allowed on family members of the user.

Note that if the user targets a pawn that inherently dislikes them, then this relationship may not last long as the magic faces.

ThingDef.label: learning potion: shooting
ThingDef.description: A one-use magic potion. The magic in the potion will cause the consumer to instantly learn much of a specific skill.\n\nThe potion is consumed orally. Once consumed, the magic quickly improve the subject's skills in a specific area, transmuting neural tissue as needed and creating knowledge.

li.useLabel: Use potion of learning to learn shooting
